Text.content: There are two types of aliases which can be defined: simple aliases and rewrite aliases.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Simple aliases consist of an alias path, a target resource, and an action that determines what happens when the path is requested from OpenCms. Simple aliases are directly connected to their target resource, so they will continue to point to that resource even if it is moved or renamed. Valid alias paths consist of one or more segments which each consist of a / and one or more characters. This means that they may not end with a trailing /.
